title: Dictionary of Kina Rutul
text:
This is the dictionary of the Rutul language (Lezgic < East-Caucasian), spoken in the settlement of Kina (Russia, Dagestan Republic).
Browse the dictionary

Please refer to the dictionary as follows:

Plain textBibTeX


Alekseeva, A., N. Beklemishev, M. Daniel, et al. (2024). Dictionary of Kina Rutul. Moscow. https://affenmilchmann.github.io/rutul-dict/.

title: Dictionary of Kina Rutul
text: To see the full page for the word click on it in the column “Glossing Label”. The full page contains examples in Rutul and their translations to Russian and also some morphological information for the word.
